definition: weight/number/code/to pile/to stack/classifier for length or distance (yard), happenings etc

sentences.english: The standard time decoder is a special equipment for active TV synchronization.
sentences.chinese: 標準時間譯碼器是有源電視時頻同步的專用設備。

sentences.english: RS hardware decoder can be used in the ground receiver system.
sentences.chinese: RS碼硬件譯碼器也可應用於地面接收系統中。
